metadata.name: forget me not
metadata.description:
to the people from my past,  
your memory still lasts,  
our memories are a treasure,  
a bond that can't be measured.

we shared laughter and tears,  
through the years and the fears,  
i hope you'll remember,  
the times we shared together.

as life takes us in different directions,  
our love remains, an unbreakable connection,  
i’m scared of being left behind,  
of fading away, out of sight, out of mind.

you left an imprint on my soul,  
a reminder of a time when we were whole,  
i cherish the memories we made,  
and the love that will never fade.

so please, don't forget the love that never ends,  
hold onto our memories tight,  
let the memories we shared guide you,  
and keep it close, day and night.

remember the love we shared,  
and know that i’ll always care,  
thank you for being a part of my life,  
for teaching me to love and strive.

and though we may be apart,  
our memories will never depart,  
i hope you know that you're not forgotten,  
and that your heart forgets me not, ever so often.
